verses.verse: And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1129>Build<s%> me <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>oxen<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> and <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram.<s%>

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H3320>Stand<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> thy burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and I will <S%H1980>go:<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7136>come<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> me: and <S%H1697>whatsoever<s%> <S%H4100><s%> he <S%H7200>showeth<s%> me I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee. And he <S%H1980>went<s%> to a high <S%H8205>place.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H1109>Balaam:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, I have <S%H6186>prepared<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and I have <S%H5927>offered<s%> upon every <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in <S%H1109>Balaam's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H3541>thus<s%> thou shalt <S%H1696>speak.<s%>

And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> he <S%H5324>stood<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> his burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice,<s%> <S%H1931>he,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> hath <S%H5148>brought<s%> me <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H758>Aram,<s%> out of the <S%H4480>mountains<s%> <S%H2042><s%> of the <S%H6924>east,<s%> saying, <S%H1980>Come,<s%> <S%H779>curse<s%> me <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H1980>come,<s%> <S%H2194>defy<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> shall I <S%H6895>curse,<s%> whom <S%H410>God<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6895>cursed?<s%> or <S%H4100>how<s%> shall I <S%H2194>defy,<s%> whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2194>defied?<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> from the <S%H4480>top<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> him, and from the <S%H4480>hills<s%> <S%H1389><s%> I <S%H7789>behold<s%> him: <S%H2005>lo,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H910>alone,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> can <S%H4487>count<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and the <S%H4557>number<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H7255>fourth<s%> part of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> Let <S%H5315>me<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3477>righteous,<s%> and let my last <S%H319>end<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> like <S%H3644>his!<s%>

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%> unto me? I <S%H3947>took<s%> thee to <S%H6895>curse<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> thou hast blessed them <S%H1288>altogether.<s%> <S%H1288><s%>

And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Must I <S%H3808>not<s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H853>that<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7760>put<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth?<s%>

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H1980>Come,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> from <S%H834>whence<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou mayest <S%H7200>see<s%> them: thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H657>but<s%> the utmost <S%H7097>part<s%> of them, and shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> them <S%H3605>all:<s%> and <S%H6895>curse<s%> me them from <S%H4480>thence.<s%> <S%H8033><s%>

And he <S%H3947>brought<s%> him into the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6839>Zophim,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H3320>Stand<s%> <S%H3541>here<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> thy burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> while <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H7136>meet<s%> the LORD <S%H3541>yonder.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Go <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H3541>thus.<s%>

And when he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H5324>stood<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> his burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him. And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H4100>What<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>

And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Rise <S%H6965>up,<s%> <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear;<s%> <S%H238>hearken<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> me, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of Zippor: <S%H6834><s%>

God <S%H410><s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> that he should <S%H3576>lie;<s%> neither the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> that he should <S%H5162>repent:<s%> hath <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> and shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> it? or hath he <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> and shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> make it <S%H6965>good?<s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have <S%H3947>received<s%> commandment to <S%H1288>bless:<s%> and he hath <S%H1288>blessed;<s%> and I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H7725>reverse<s%> it.

He hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5027>beheld<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> hath he <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5999>perverseness<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> him, and the <S%H8643>shout<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is among them.
God <S%H410><s%> brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt;<s%> <S%H4714><s%> he hath as it were the <S%H8443>strength<s%> of a <S%H7214>unicorn.<s%>

Surely <S%H3588><s%> there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5173>enchantment<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is there any <S%H7081>divination<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> according to this <S%H6256>time<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> hath <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6466>wrought!<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> as a great <S%H3833>lion,<s%> and lift up <S%H5375>himself<s%> as a young <S%H738>lion:<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H1571>Neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> curse them at <S%H6895>all,<s%> <S%H6895><s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> <S%H3808><s%> bless them at <S%H1288>all.<s%> <S%H1288><s%>

But <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1696>Told<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> I thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh,<s%> that I must <S%H6213>do?<s%>

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> I will <S%H3947>bring<s%> thee <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> it will <S%H3474>please<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> that thou mayest <S%H6895>curse<s%> me them from <S%H4480>thence.<s%> <S%H8033><s%>

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> unto the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor,<s%> that <S%H8259>looketh<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3452>Jeshimon.<s%>

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1129>Build<s%> me <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H559>said,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
